sentences.en: An outfitter provided everything needed for the safari.
sentences.cn: 一家旅行用品商提供了探险所需的一切装备.

sentences.en: Buffet lunch at Safari World . After arrival Bangkok, visit Four Face Buddha.
sentences.cn: 到达曼谷, 前往四面佛,参拜及许愿保佑各界平安.

sentences.en: He had been on safari in East Africa with his son.
sentences.cn: 他曾和他儿子到东非游猎。

sentences.en: He'd like to go on safari to photograph snakes and tigers.
sentences.cn: 他想去游猎以拍摄蛇和老虎。

sentences.en: I've always wanted to go on safari and photograph some elephants.
sentences.cn: 我一直都很想参加狩猎旅行,拍些大象的照片.

sentences.en: Many safari groups offer luxurious hotels with personal chefs.
sentences.cn: 很多狩猎之旅团提供有私人主厨的奢侈旅馆.

sentences.en: My trip to South Africa was out - of - this - world -- especially the safari.
sentences.cn: 我的南非之旅棒极了 -- 尤其是狩猎.
你花了3500美元买这些陶瓷动物?

sentences.en: Spotted in a safari park: Elepants! Please stay in your car!
sentences.cn: 野生动物园标语: 有大象, 请呆在你车里!

sentences.en: Spotted in a safari sark: Elephants! Please stay in your car!
sentences.cn: 野生动物园标语: 有大象! 请呆在您的车里!

sentences.en: The animals are close up and enjoyed the safari trip.
sentences.cn: 能如此近的看到动物所以我们很享受这样的旅程.

sentences.en: There are several general rules to follow when traveling on safari.
sentences.cn: 在探险观光中要遵守几个普遍的规则.

sentences.en: They could film wild animals during the safari.
sentences.cn: 他们在探险中可以拍摄野生动物.

sentences.en: Three men , members of a safari , are captured by cannibals in the jungle.
sentences.cn: 三位旅行者误入一片丛林, 被食人族抓获.

sentences.en: We are on a snow - mobile safari. It's magic.
sentences.cn: 我们在驾驶摩托雪橇野游, 真是妙极了.

sentences.en: When we go on safari we like to cook on an open fire.
sentences.cn: 我们远行狩猎时,喜欢露天生火做饭.

trans.tran_cn: 游猎，陆路旅行（尤指在东非或中非），类似游猎的假日旅行，旅行队
trans.tran_en: A safari is a trip to observe or hunt wild animals, especially in East Africa
